name: Moonlit Match
description:
This is a simple match-three game where you have 15 moves and need to get as high of a score as possible. Combos give more points than matches, so it may be worthwhile to "waste" a turn by swapping pieces that don't create a match in order to set up a combo.

Developed in Godot for the "Stop Waiting for Godot" jam:
https://itch.io/jam/stop-waiting-for-godot
